quote: Experience is the best teacher.
author: Penelope Douglas,  Bully

quote: We had the experience but missed the meaning. And approach to the meaning restores the experience in a different form.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Experience is the opposite of education.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: Experience is more important than knowledge.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: Knowledge & understanding mixed with ones convictions of 'experience' is hardly impositional". ~R. Alan Woods [2012]
author: R. Alan Woods,  The Journey Is The Destination: A Photo Journal

quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: Experience is merely the name men gave to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Do you know the difference between education and experience? Education is when you read the fine print; experience is what you get when you don't.
author: Pete Seeger

quote: Education is experience, and the essence of experience is self-reliance.
author: T.H. White,  The Once and Future King

quote: A learning experience is one of those things that says, 'You know that thing you just did? Don't do that.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Salmon of Doubt

quote: Learning from Experience Learning from experience means, 'Boy, did I just fuck up!
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Our experience is coloured through and through by books and plays and the cinema, and it takes patience and skill to disentangle the things we have really learned from life for ourselves.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Today’s experience is necessary to equip you fully for the future.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli,  The Prince

quote: Your life experience is a moving picture, of which you are writer, director, performer, producer and critic.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Stories You Can Feel!
author: Corey Aaron Burkes,  Scratch - with Audio Theater and Links

quote: Remember, young man, experience is not the best teacher. Other people's experience is the best teacher. By reading about the lives of great people, you can unlock the secrets to what made them great.
author: Andy Andrews,  The Noticer: Sometimes, All a Person Needs Is a Little Perspective

quote: Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Talking with you is sort of the conversational equivalent of an out of body experience.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: What comes from experience is knowledge,what comes naturally is wisdom.
author: NITYA MORE

quote: As we have seen there is some kind of continuity in any case since every experience affects for better or worse the attitudes which help decide the quality of further experiences, by setting up certain preference and aversion, and making it easier or harder to act for this or that end.
author: John Dewey

quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
author: Armistead Maupin

quote: Every day is not a day to master but an adventure to experience.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: If a writer stops observing he is finished. Experience is communicated by small details intimately observed.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Nothing good was learnt too swiftly. Knowledge should be a purposeful accumulance of observed experience, applied and tested to the full.
author: Jane Borodale,  The Book of Fires

quote: If I discover within myself a desire which no experience in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that I was made for another world.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The more aware of your intentions and your experiences you become, the more you will be able to connect the two, and the more you will be able to create the experiences of your life consciously. This is the development of mastery. It is the creation of authentic power.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Everything I’ve ever done, ever thought, ever experienced, and ever felt, has led me up to this moment in my life. And after accumulating and culminating it, all I can say is, “Ahhhhh!
author: Jarod Kintz,  Great Listener Seeks Mute Women

quote: Observing your thoughts, feelings & sensations is the grist of the practice.
author: Allan Lokos,  Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: when somebody plays music, you listen. you just follow those sounds, and eventually you understand the music. the point can't be explained in words because music is not words, but after listening for a while, you understand the point of it, and that point is the music itself. in exactly the same way, you can listen to all experiences.
author: Alan W. Watts,  Still the Mind: An Introduction to Meditation

quote: Your body is a physical representation of the cumulative effect of all the experiences you’ve had throughout your life.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: I want to be clear about this. If you wrote from experience, you'd get maybe one book, maybe three poems. Writers write from empathy.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Curiosity is the origin of knowledge. Experience is the origin of wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything you need to know you have learned through your journey.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: Only the person who has experienced light and darkness, war and peace, rise and fall, only that person has truly experienced life.
author: Stefan Zweig,  The World of Yesterday

quote: We will experience the life we have the faith to experience.
author: Julia Cameron,  Faith and Will: Weathering the Storms in Our Spiritual Lives

quote: We just had a near-life experience!
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Your mind is the knife that cuts the continuum of space and time into neat slices of linear experience.
author: Deepak Chopra,  The Way of the Wizard: Twenty Spiritual Lessons for Creating the Life You Want

quote: We must experience certain things in life, even in our childhood, so we can later look back and value the journey.
author: Tanya R. Liverman,  Journey to Legacy: A Poetic Timeline of My Life

quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told to.
author: Alan Keightley

quote: Know, in every moment, that you have attracted this situation into your life experience so you can grow and learn the lessons necessary to get to the next level.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: We can have in life but one great experience at best, and the secret of life is to reproduce that experience as often as possible.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: To enhance your experience and consciousness, your mind is always trying to understand everything that is going on around you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: One goes through school, college, medical school and one's internship learning little or nothing about goodness but a good deal about success.
author: Ashley Montagu

quote: The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
author: Albert Einstein,  The World As I See It

quote: Time is not the great teacher. Experience is. A man may live a whole life, but if he never leaves his home to experience that life, he dies knowing nothing. A mere child who has suffered and lived can be the wiser of the two.
author: Lynsay Sands,  Love Bites

quote: To perceive is to suffer.
author: Aristotle

quote: Accept yourself: flaws, quirks, talents, secret thoughts, all of it, and experience true liberation.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree
